title: Fully capable
excerpt: Generally, it's not lack of access, assets, or knowledge that holds you back from realizing your aspirations or goals.

children.text: Generally, it's not lack of access, assets, or knowledge that holds you back from realizing your aspirations or goals.
Just a lack of a willingness to expend the effort necessary to fully leverage these resources.
There's never been an easier time in human history to accomplish all that you set out to. And telling yourself anything other than that is a trap.
